Toothbrush Subscription Service: Create a subscription service that delivers a new toothbrush head every three months, ensuring that users always have a fresh brush and promotes good oral hygiene habits. The service could also offer personalized recommendations based on user preferences and needs.

Eco-Friendly Toothbrush: Design a toothbrush made from biodegradable materials that can be composted at the end of its life. This would reduce the environmental impact of disposable toothbrushes and promote sustainability.

Toothbrush with Built-In Timers: Develop a toothbrush with a built-in timer that ensures users brush for the recommended two minutes, promoting better oral hygiene habits. The toothbrush could also include multiple timers for different brushing modes, such as gum care or teeth whitening.

Toothbrush with Replaceable Heads: Create a toothbrush with interchangeable brush head options that cater to different needs, such as sensitive teeth, gum care, or teeth whitening. This would allow users to customize their brushing experience and extend the life of the toothbrush.

Toothbrush with UV Sanitization: Develop a toothbrush with built-in UV sanitization that kills bacteria and germs on the bristles, promoting better oral hygiene. The toothbrush could also include a built-in cleaning brush to remove plaque and stains from the bristles.
